entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
